Text:
I love this product. If you love PB but never purchase a jar because you could eat an entire jar in a day or 2, this product is for you. I loved FitzNuts PB until I bought PB2. It is superior. I have it on apples or cabbage. I don't overeat it because you have to mix it up - takes seconds - with water. I have even used it in recipes that call for 1/4 cup PB. It works fine.
Just remember, it is not PB. If you are a die-hard PB Connoisseur, this may not be for you but if you love PB but want something with less calories and fat, PB2 is for you!
